titles.title: Come Ye Up And Bring Your Branches

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come ye up and bring your branches.
Come ye up, bring your wine and oil.
Rejoice before Him with songs and dances.
Come and live in the feast of joy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Since the trumpet has sounded clear,
Come be cleansed from self and and sin.
The celebration is drawing near.
The King of glory shall come in.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
From your cities, come every one,
Up to Zion, the chosen place.
With all the brethren to live as one,
Seeing Jesus face to face.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oh ven y sube, trae tus ramas
Con tu aceite y vino ven
Regocijémonos con canto y danza
A la fiesta de gozo ven.
Cada uno venga de la ciudad
El lugar escogido es Sión
Viviendo en uno con los hermanos
Cara a cara a Cristo ver
Suena trompeta, suena claro ya
De ser limpio de sí mismo y pecado
La celebración cercana está
Y el Rey de gloria entrará
